Reviews.Title: Rather have Less
Reviews.Author: Jimmy
Reviews.Content: I received this package last week and must say i am real happy with the overall package price. How-ever there is a few items that i must say is so low quality & really isn't suitable for the camera it came with.The full size tripod is not close enough to be sturdy enough for this camera & would only have the worry that it would fall over at some point. Mini Tripod also, is only good enough for a small point & shoot digi cam.The flash gun, again too under-rated (specs) & low quality for a camera of this type.The camera bag is far to small to carry the camera & equipment that was in the package. Barely enough room to carry the camera with Lens attached & battery charger and that is all you get inside it.As i said though, overall this is a great deal. But i had to go out & purchase a new bag, tripod & a proper flash which has cost me approx. $500 at the local shops. No heartache really, but it did cost me more time to go and get these items. If i had known at the time of the order, i would of purchased these extras through Amazon at the time of the camera order & also saved more money this way.What i would rather see included in this package, is for the above items to be removed and have the suppliers include a more suitable backpack style bag. I just think it's better to have less in the package, but have more quality & suitable items especially with a camera of this quality.I hope this helps spme people out there that are looking to buy this or a similar package.

Reviews.Title: Off brand accessories break on the job
Reviews.Author: Media Steve "Media Steve"
Reviews.Content: I bought this package for the t3i's hd video capabilities. First day I took it out on the job the case's strap broke. Next the charger broke. The tripod was terrible from the start. And just now while shooting a music video for a dj for my internship the sd card broke on me for no explainable reason. All of the Zeikos and Digital Film accessories are absolutely horrible. If you're willing to spend this much money on the camera and lenses alone, go for it. If you want quality accessories to go with it, don't buy from Sunset.

Reviews.Title: Auto features are for me! Love it! It's like a point and shoot on steroids!
Reviews.Author: mlwright
Reviews.Content: I've not had my camera long and have only taken 200 pictures, but let me tell you, I am impressed!  Don't get me wrong, I know very little about cameras.  I am not a photographer.  I just want to take good pictures of family, friends, places and everyday life in general.  That being said, I am an outdoor person, hunting & fishing and wanted to take better wildlife pictures.  I chose this camera because of the reviews and all the auto features. I chose this package because it included the "IS" lenses and the best price.  I took pictures of deer in the woods behind my house, that I literaly couldn't see until viewing through the camera's zoom lense and the pictures were great. The everyday pictures around the house are great as well, there is much more depth in the pictures. As I am not a photographer I do not have the word bank to describe the difference.  Auto focus is for definitly me.  I do plan on taking classes so that someday I can play with all of the manual features but until then, THIS CAMERA MAKES ME A MUCH BETTER PHOTOGRAPHER!

Reviews.Title: Wrong battery charger.
Reviews.Author: Pinkcat
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Canon EOS Rebel T31 complete package deal.  Opened up the travel quick charger and found out the hard way that the battery doesn't fit.  I looked at the package and it states that the charger is for Canon NB-7L batteries.Please pay close attention to everything when unpacking the box and not assume everything is going to fit together.

Reviews.Title: Good deal...but some items are worthless
Reviews.Author: Ian
Reviews.Content: So let me start by saying that this is a fair price for what you get.Awesome Camera!, Good lenses and filters. That was worth it. What is completely useless are the tripod, camera bag and I received an 8gb SD card not 16gb. The seller did try to contact me before he shipped it out...that said I called back 3 times and got no return phone call...I assume it was about the 16gb card. I got the bundle a day later. it seems he threw in a few extra camera batteries to make up the difference...which is fine...I don't care about that so much. But the tripod is way to flimsy for the weight of that camera. The Camera Bag is way to small. It also came with a sub par flash...however it's not useless. I bought a Canon 580EX II Speedlite flash separately and will use the flash that came with the kit as a secondary slave. If it were a dream kit...I would take out the current tripods, camera bag, and flash and replace them with a decent tripod that can handle the weight of the T3i.

Reviews.Title: Canon T3i Rebel w/Zoom Pro Accessories Kit
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: The package I purchased included: Canon T3i body and 18-55 mm IS-II lens kit, Canon 55-250mm IS-II lens, a wide angle lense, a 2x telephoto lense, a macro lense, additional car/wall socket battery charger, 2 additional Vivitar batteries, 16gb class 10 20Mb/s SDHC card, Zekios camera bag, Zekios full size tripod, Zekios 3-pc filter set(UV, CPL, FL), mini tripod, Vivitar external flash, SDHC card reader, screen protectors, camera cleaning kit, 2 microfiber cloths. The Canon T3i camera body is all I can handle as a novice. It has every feature I could want or probably need at my skill level. Both Canon lenses take great photos and feel sturdy enough to stand the test of time. They are however noisy when auto-focusing. I haven't used them on manual focusing yet, so can not comment on their effectiveness. The batteries last a long time. I have already snapped ~500 photos and am still running strong on the first battery which is one of the Vivitar's.  I have used the screw on macro lense and have had mixed results with it. I have a few great shots of a bug up close with it that are clear all around and some fuzzy shots of a flower, so maybe it is just my lack of photography skill that is keeping me from using it to it's full potential. Both tripods are junk. The full size is very plasticy and feels like it wouldn't hold up for very long and be very hard to get adjusted properly. The mini is plain stupid for a camera of this size, it barely fits my wife's little point and shoot. The Vivitar flash is very basic, it flashes and tilts but that is about it. The Zekios camara bag at first glance looks to be a good bag, but upon trying to load my camera and the rest of this kit's gear into it, it is too small and rather hard to get organized. I also have my doubts as to it's durability in the long term. The SDHC card has enough space for nearly 500 raw+jpg photos which is more than I will probably ever take in a single shooting, so am very pleased with it. It is also fast enough for my speed of shooting so far. I did take a couple HD videos with it and there were no studders. The card reader on the other hand is some no brand chinese garbage, in order for it to work, you have to carefully place the card into the reader before plugging the reader into the computer. It is also really slow to read the contents from the card. The screen protectors are not made for this camera's screen and have to be cut to proper size. The additional charger is very nice to have on a long trip. Overall this kit is good; however, you would probably be better off and maybe save a few dollars by just getting a couple extra batteries and saving your money for better hardware such as dedicated macro lenses, a really good camera bag, tripod, etc... I love the camera, just not so thrilled about the accessories.

Reviews.Title: A good deal for a good combo
Reviews.Author: networkpro
Reviews.Content: Saw the review of the body over at imaging-resource.com and looked for a good price on it and included 2 Canon Image Stabilized Lenses to replace our Minolta (RIP) SLR and jump into the digital age. Body + the 2 Lenses was worth the price alone but when you add in the two extra batteries, extra charger (with car adapter for vacations) and 2 other lenses its a very good price.  I know you'll constantly see people complain about included merchandise and the bag, but price the components everywhere else and make up your own mind. No one uses a carry bag the same or carries everything along all the time. 3 Business day delivery standard worked very well. No complaints at all.

Reviews.Title: Hope you do not need warranty service
Reviews.Author: Allen Kisamore
Reviews.Content: I bought this Canon EOS T3i DSLR to replace and old faithful Minolta, (what a mistake!!) After 4 months the interior lenses cleaning function stuck and the camera is no longer usable. When I sent it in for warranty service I get a note back from them telling me that they can and will at there discretion, "repair your equipment or exchange it for refurbished equipment of the same model, or for new or refurbished equipment of an equivalent model to your equipment, with the same or additional features. Recovered, manufactured, repaired and/or recycled parts may be used in connection with such repair." I bought a new camera with a one year warranty with no warranty disclosures of this note. If I wanted a rebuilt or used camera I could have saved myself a couple of hundred dollars and wouldn't have went to all of the additional expense of buying the accessories that I did hear on Amazon.com in the area of $1200 - $1400. BUYERS BEWARE  Amazon, I know Canon is a large manufacturer but please honor your partron and do not delete this product review! All buyers should be aware of what kind of warranty there product carries and believe that for an honest dollar they get an honest product.

Reviews.Title: T3I camera and access.
Reviews.Author: TW
Reviews.Content: Most of the equipment the cameras and lens are great my wife is very happy with her gift. The minny tripod isn't what I expected. it is very small don't know where you would use it Other than that we are very happy with the product

Reviews.Title: Superb pictures with ease
Reviews.Author: Judy Kreiling
Reviews.Content: Printed my first pictures with the T3i and am excited about the clarity and quality. I used both the 18-55 and the 75-250 lenses with equal success. Took action shots at both a skating show and hockey game which are magazine quality and I am truly an amatuer photographer. Had great beach/sunset pictures as well. Extras in the package are providing me many, many options. Looking forward to lots of years of quality, fun photography whether while traveling or at home.

Reviews.Title: Camera and lenses are awesome - the kit is crap
Reviews.Author: aaron
Reviews.Content: Save yourself $200 and buy another package with just the camera and lenses.  All of the extra stuff included in this package is low quality crap.  You'll be better off purchasing those things later as you need them and from a higher quality manufacturer.  The camera an lense are 5 stars so far  The rest are one star, so I gave this offering 2 stars overall.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: iggie204
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this package. The only problem is the bag that comes with it is to small for all the accessories that come with it. But the camera is amazing and so are the accessories!

Reviews.Title: I loved my Camera
Reviews.Author: Ammar Hadidi
Reviews.Content: I loved my camera very much... I am so pleased with the package I received the fast shipping of the dealer... I have been using it and adore it so much... I am totally satisfied with it.

Reviews.Title: Best digital photos
Reviews.Author: Deb P "Sci fi geek"
Reviews.Content: Wonderful photos !! Digital photos to match no other. I first used this camera in Hawaii and the photos of the beautiful sunsets were clear and beautiful.

Reviews.Title: in love with my camera
Reviews.Author: Lesley Mack
Reviews.Content: I just love this camera!!!! It's amazing!!!  I've had it just over a year now. I still love my camera.  I've taken it to Florida with my family and friends and it took some super amazing shots.

Reviews.Title: Canon Camera and Canon Lens are great, don't need the rest...
Reviews.Author: Mariano Hernan Donadu
Reviews.Content: For sure Canon Rebel T3i with Canon lens (18-55 / 55-250) it great, incredible products and combination. I'm not professional, I'm starter in photography and this camera will fit my expectation for a long time. Lens are great (important to have both features AF and  Image Stabilizer), pictures you can obtain are perfect!!, Also combination of both 18-55 / 55-250 ir perfect.Regarding the rest of the products contained in the bundle, they sucks, don't work, they are low-low-low quality and they not perform. It is clear that the rest of the products contained in the bundle are there to catch up you interest or attention, but, since you touch them, see them, you realize that they cost probably 2 to 3 dollar each. My recommendation, just buy the camera, 2 Canon lens and buy a very good bag (Lowerpro or Canon branded) and when you need more accesories, just buy good ones.Batteries and charger:

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: San
Reviews.Content: good product, value for money.all product item came same time, but 2 cell came later later. its Ok. one can have such product. lens is good

Reviews.Title: canon T3i Rebel kit
Reviews.Author: Lindy Shrewsbury
Reviews.Content: I love my camera, the only thing is that the telephoto lens that u get with it doesn't fit the camera!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: W Lough
Reviews.Content: I recieved my order yesterday on time as I requested. This was an early birthday, christmas, & employee of the month gift for my boyfriend. When he saw & opened the box he was like a child at christmas. He immediately went to playing with it and using it. I would recomend this kit to anyone:) I would also recomend that you order the hood(S) for the lenses, as well as the vivtar bounce zoom slave flash. Since him and his son are beginngers. I ordered the hood to cut down on glare, the extra flash so they can learn what flash to use for what type of lighting. Him and his son enjoys it, is very happy with their kit:) Like I said, a GREAT Kit. Thank YOU Sunset for helping me with my concerns and getting it to me on time:) YOU all rock :)

Reviews.Title: Rebel T3i
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Thank you for a great camera! It is so much fun to use.Had the camera for a month now and already taken over 2500 picturesThe shipment arrived quickly.The camera is amazing. It takes amazing pictures in all kinds of light.The action pictures are stunning.The whole kit is nice. Bag is small, but i didn't buy this for the bag.Having three batteries is awesome. The Canon lenses are great.Accessories like the SD reader makes life easier.I had an issue with the SD card in the bundle being defective.Sunset immediately sent out a replacement SD Card and was easy to work with.I would definitely recommend them and this bundle to anyone.Thanks...

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: Sebs
Reviews.Content: Muy buena camara, el lente 55-200 muy bueno tambien, el resto de los accesorios que entran dentro del paquete estan buenos pero no los recomiendo, es preferible compralos por separado luego de tener la camara

Reviews.Title: Good Camera !
Reviews.Author: hiroky
Reviews.Content: This package is quite useful. I love to use the wide angle macro lens and telephoto lens especially. They enhance DSLR function.

Reviews.Title: Canon T3i
Reviews.Author: Photographer
Reviews.Content: I got this deal from Amazon it was a great deal to me.I suggest it for everyone looking to the same camera.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3i package review
Reviews.Author: Martin
Reviews.Content: This was a great value for the price paid.  Ordering was simple and it was shipped on time to meet a deadline we had for a photography class.  I think the only short coming was the flash.  Two flashes came with the package and we would have preferred a single flash with more capability.  Very satisfied though.

ProductInfo.Features:
18.0 Megapixel CMOS (APS-C) sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor for high image quality and speed.     ISO 100 - 6400 (expandable to 12800) for shooting from bright to dim light.
Improved EOS Full HD Movie mode with manual exposure control, expanded recording [1920 x 1080 Full HD video at frame rates of 30 (29.97), 24 (23.976) and 25.0 frames per second] with new Movie Digital zoom and Video Snapshot features for enhanced movie shooting options.     Vari-angle 3.0-inch Clear View LCD monitor (3:2) for shooting at high or low angles and 1,040,000-dot VGA with reflection reduction using multi coating and high-transparency materials for bright and clear viewing.
New Scene Intelligent Auto mode and Picture Style Auto incorporating the new EOS Scene Detection System to capture beautiful scenes with ease.     Express your creativity with advanced imaging features like Basic+ function, Multi-Aspect function and Creative Filters.
Enhanced metering with a 63-zone, Dual-layer metering system for accurate metering between exposures, and 9-point AF system utilizing a high precision, f/2.8 cross-type center point.     3.7 fps continuous shooting up to approximately 34 JPEGs or approximately 6 RAW.
New Feature Guide offers short descriptions of each function and Quick Control screen for easy operation.     Compatibility with SD/SDHC/SDXC memory cards.     Compatible with the full line of Canon EF and EF-S lenses.
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i SLR Digital Camera Kit with Canon 18-55mm IS Lens + TTL Flash for Canon Cameras + Wide Angle Macro Lens + 2x Telephoto Lens + 16GB SDHC + Replacement LP-E8 Battery & Charger + Focus 57-inch Tripod w/ Case + Accessory Kit
